TopicTitle: Here's a parody of the Foo Fighters' Learn To Fly called Waiting For 1.1 I wrote [SCRIPT ONLY]

Articles.Content:
Waiting For 1.1 - A parody of the Foo Fighters' Learn to Fly

 

This took me 15 minutes to make. There's no video or audio, just the script. I think we can all relate to what this song talks about. 

Sidenote: If you can sing it, try it! Maybe you will end up inside a video I will make for this! If you do try it, your try will end up DOWN BELOOOW

THE SONG ITSELF: 

Spoiler

 

While I Wait For 1.1 - A Parody of the Foo Fighters' Learn To Fly
Written by Coolstorm10


Run and tell all of the kerbals
This could take all night
Think I need a kraken to help me 
Make stuff fly

Cause the framerate is so sloow
We sat around the screen
And watched this one explode

I'm looking for 1.1 to save me
Looking for a normal framerate
Looking for something to help me fly normally

I'm looking for an update
Looking cause I'm tired of slideshows
Play some other game while
I wait for 1.1

Think I'm done nursing the kraken
I can wait a week
I'd give it all away
If you give me this update

Living happily ever trapped
If you just release 1.1
Run and tell the kerbals
That everything is nominal

I'm looking for 1.1 to save me
Looking for a normal framerate
Looking for something to help me fly normally

I'm looking for an update
Looking cause I'm tired of slideshows
Play some other game while
I wait for 1.1

I can't wait now 
I need Unity 5
Try to survive with 32 bit
I can't wait now 
I need Unity 5
Try to survive with 32 bit

I'm looking for 1.1 to save me
Looking for a normal framerate
Looking for something to help me fly normally

I'm looking for an update
Looking cause I'm tired of slideshows
Play some other game while
I wait for 

I'm looking for 1.1 to save me
Looking for a normal framerate
Looking for something to help me fly normally

I'm looking for an update
Looking cause I'm tired of slideshows
Play some other game while
I wait for 1.1
Play some other game while
I wait for 1.1
Play some other game while
I wait for 1.1

 

How is the song? Did I do horribly? Should I go kill myself since this is horrible? Am I a god? Did the kraken kill you? Post it in the comments BELOW
